COMP.5209 - Interface Analysis and Design - S1 - TG - 2018


Course Aim:

The aim of this course is to provide students with the skills to analyse and evaluat clienrequirements, design user interfaces, and select appropriate web technology framework.


Learning Outcomes:

  • Determine client requirements for a web application.
  • Carry out the responsive design (with device and platform independence) of useexperience.
  • Optimise media for the web.
  • Select an appropriate web technology framework.

Topics:

  • Analysis process including stakeholder interaction and feasibility study.
  • Documentation of application business processes using modelling tools.
  • Comparison of application frameworks (including security aspects).
  • Design a prototype UI utilising an appropriate technology.
  • Implementation of multi-media assets for user interfaces.
  • Implementation of user experience (UX) design including user interface (UI), HCI principles and universal accessibility.

Assessment Requirements Due Date Weighting
Assessment 1 Analysis Assignment 1/03/2018 30%
Assessment 2 Design Assignment 25/05/2018 40%
Assessment 3 - Part A Implementation Assignment 05/05/2018 30%
Assessment 3 - Part B Implementation Assignment 20/05/2018 30%

Assignments:

Assignment 1: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1QfL-RfgjY8v6-520IuMZn6vEMSrvMPNfp>

Assignment 2: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/17D6d9k0-oWJASMaDwQCXRgGdkxc17tSqp>

Assignment 3 - Part A: https://docs.google.com/document/1hChNfjh2VFEnNdb_v101wLsoPhj5OCTKbJda9xO4bIM/edit#

Assignment 3 - Part B: https://bitbucket.org/marisaamy/10002444-5209-assign3/src/master/
